character_info.name: Aura Sphere
character_info.hint: it looks like it could be an interdimensional portal that teleported an airline on two pieces of camera footage from 2014

sections.info: A dark blue sphere with a white outline and a dot in the center
sections.obtaining: Go to abandoned zone and found PC with binary on it "01110010001110000111010100110111" decrypt it and you will get "r8u7", say that as /e code and you will get teleported to aura sphere

[[File:YoylefactoryRealm.png|2000px]]
{{CharacterInfo |name=Aura Sphere |character=[[File:Aura Sphere.png]] |difficulty=[[File:Dreadful.png|link=]] '''Dreadful''' |area=[[Yoyle Factory/Abandonment|Yoyle Factory]] |hint=it looks like it could be an interdimensional portal that teleported an airline on two pieces of camera footage from 2014 |additionalinfo }} == Info == A dark blue sphere with a white outline and a dot in the center == Obtaining == '''''The following text will show instructions on how to get this object. If you wish to find it by yourself, avoid opening the text.'''''
Go to abandoned zone and found PC with binary on it "01110010001110000111010100110111" decrypt it and you will get "r8u7", say that as /e code and you will get teleported to aura sphere
